title: 109_hr3653
content: Employee Participation Incentive Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) cap at 30 percent the maximum income tax rate for corporations that have a 20 percent or greater employee ownership rate. (2) exclude from employee gross income up to 20 percent of wages paid in stock. And (3) allow such corporations a tax deduction for certain stock options granted to employees.
